com.pilot.jword
Class StyleConstantsExt

java.lang.Object
  com.pilot.jword.StyleConstantsExt
Direct Known Subclasses:
StyleConstantsExt.BorderConstants, StyleConstantsExt.CharacterConstants, StyleConstantsExt.EquationConstants, StyleConstantsExt.NamedStyleConstants, StyleConstantsExt.PageConstants, StyleConstantsExt.ParagraphConstants, StyleConstantsExt.TableConstants
public class StyleConstantsExt
extends java.lang.Object

Extended attribute definitions for JWordTextPane. Hold standard values, and provides functions to modify and retrieve extended attributes, such as borders, colors, page/column settings.
